import React from 'react'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import ST from './star.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const MDP = () => { const [movie, setMovie] = useState([]); const genreMapping = { 28: 'Action', 12: 'Adventure', 16: 'Animation', 35: 'Comedy', 80: 'Crime', 99: 'Documentary', 18: 'Drama', 10751: 'Family', 14: 'Fantasy', 36: 'History', 27: 'Horror', 10402: 'Music', 9648: 'Mystery', 10749: 'Romance', 878: 'Science Fiction', 10770: 'TV Movie', 53: 'Thriller', 10752: 'War', 37: 'Western', }; useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:8000/movie_details/?name=Iron Man`) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { setMovie(data); }); }, []); return (
OMAR
{movie.genres.map((element, index) => ( ))}

{movie.release_date}

{movie.title}

{movie.overview}

{movie.vote_average}

Quelle note donnerer vous a ce film ?

REGARDER LA BANDE ANNONCE

); }; export default MDP;
